title: Failure while building NAMD after PR #19452 .
body:
Failure while building NAMD after PR #19452 .
 ```
35     # init_tcl_pointers() declaration and implementation are inconsistent
 36     # "src/colvarproxy_namd.C", line 482: error: inherited member is not
 37     # allowed
 38     patch('inherited-member.patch', when='@:2.13')
 39     patch('inherited-member-2.14.patch', when='@2.14:')
```
If above patch is specific to nvhpc, please use "if-condition" to mention the same. I hope this is not generic patch.

build command: `spack install -v namd@2.12 interface=tcl ^charmpp backend=mpi build-target=charm++ ^openmpi@4.0.3`
output:

> ==> Installing namd
> ==> No binary for namd found: installing from source
> ==> Warning: gcc@8.3.1 cannot build optimized binaries for "zen2". Using best target possible: "zen"
> 1 out of 1 hunk FAILED -- saving rejects to file src/colvarproxy_namd.C.rej
> ==> Using cached archive: spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/2a/2a1191909b1ab03bf0205971ad4d8ee9.tar.gz
> ==> Patch spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/namd/inherited-member.patch failed.


_Originally posted by @mohan002 in https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/19452#issuecomment-720013402_
